### Part 0 - [Fundamentals of Web apps](https://fullstackopen.com/en/part0)

An overall introduction to the course. It introduces to some concepts like HTTP requests, how traditional web apps work, DOM, CSS and Single Page Applications.
```
- General Info
- Fundamentals of Web apps
```

- ['/new_note'](https://www.websequencediagrams.com/cgi-bin/cdraw?--BnRoZQCHZAVzIGFycmF5AIJPCwo&s=default) - The diagram shows how communicate the browser and the server when user added a note to a page containing JavaScript.

- ['/spa'](https://www.websequencediagrams.com/cgi-bin/cdraw?lz=bm90ZSBvdmVyIGJyb3dzZXI6ClVzZXIgYXJyaXZlcyB0byBodHRwczovL3N0dWRpZXMuY3MuaGVsc2lua2kuZmkvZXhhbXBsZWFwcC9zcGEKZW5kIG5vdGUKAEkHLT5zZXJ2ZXI6IEhUVFAgR0VUACIvADkGLS0-&s=default) - The diagram shows the communication between the browser and the server when user opened single page app on the browser.

- ['/new_note_spa'](https://www.websequencediagrams.com/cgi-bin/cdraw?lz=bm90ZSBvdmVyIGJyb3dzZXI6ClVzZXIgYXJyaXZlcyB0byBodHRwczovL3N0dWRpZXMuY3MuaGVsc2lua2kuZmkvZXhhbXBsZWFwcC9zcGEKZW5kIG5vdGUKAEkHLT5zZXJ2ZXI6IEhUVFAgR0VUACIvADkGLS0-&s=default) - The diagram shows how communicate the browser and the server when user added a note to a single page app.
